Home.our-goal: Our goal is to collectively run 6992km and raise funds for the purchase of tactical radios for our defenders in Ukraine.
Home.new-global-season-description-1: In the new 2023 running season, #RunForUkraine is becoming a truly international running initiative. This year we have a global mission - #RunForUkraine Around Ukraine, that was created to unite the whole world around Ukraine and its integrity! The idea is to run anywhere in the world, make a donation at
Home.new-global-season-description-2: and see your contributions being converted into kilometers on our website so at some point all together we can reach the goal of running 6992 km in total!
